text: Aleksa Terzić (born 17 August 1999) is a Serbian professional footballer. He plays as a left back for Austrian Bundesliga club FC Red Bull Salzburg and the Serbia national team. ==Club career== Terzić started his career at FK Red Star Belgrade. For the 2018/19 season he was promoted to the club’s professional squad. He then promptly made his debut in the SuperLiga in July 2018 on the first day of season. He was only used once more before the winter break. In the winter break he was loaned to third division club FK Grafičar Belgrade in February 2019. For the 2019/20 season he moved to Italy to AC Fiorentina in the Seria A. He played only two matches and was then loaned to the second division club FC Empoli for the 2020/21 season. He made 21 appearances in Serie B for Empoli and was promoted to Seria A at the end of the season. The defender then returned to Fiorentina for the 2021/22 season. In the 2021/22 season he then made 14 appearances. In the 2022/23 season he made 22 appearances in Serie A and also reached the final of the UEFA Europa Conference League with Fiorentina. In July 2023 Terzić moved to the Austrian Bundesliga club FC Red Bull Salzburg.
